section.heading: Agency fund.
section.text: *NOTE: This codification is not the most current, due to recent law changes. To see the current law (including emergency and temporary legislation, if relevant) click this link: Current Version*

para.text: There is established the Automated External Defibrillator Registration Fee Fund (“Fund”), as a non-lapsing, revolving fund, to be administered by the Mayor as an agency fund, as that term is defined in § 47-373(2)(I), and to be used exclusively for the purposes stated in § 7-2371.02.
The Fund shall be financed through registration fees generated pursuant to § 7-2371.02 and regulations promulgated by the Mayor.
The Fund shall be accounted for under procedures established pursuant to subchapter V of Chapter 3 of Title 47
